name: Wilhelmina's Wacky Brew
description:
Story

Every year on Halloween all the monsters of the world gather in a swamp within Europe to host the ‘Creepiest Creature of the year’ competition, a competition where monsters prank and mess with humans to win the prize. One entrant, Wilhelmina the witch, has dreamed of winning this competition since she was a little spellcaster and now has her chance to make her dream a reality. Wilhelmina and her zombie friend Zack travel the world, collecting ingredients for an ultimate brew that will earn Wilhelmina the coveted title of Creepiest Creature. Along the way the clumsy witch and her aloof friend encounter a variety of colourful characters who react to her wacky personality in various ways such as humans who treat her like a queen, vampires who will stop at nothing to prevent Wilhelmina from winning the competition and a bogeyman who perhaps overestimates his chances. Come and follow Wilhelmina on this wacky adventure that may not be all that it seems.

Features

Word Count - 6000+

Multiple Endings - Three different possible endings to get

Credits

UI Artist & Programming - Myuix

Background Artist - Wenexx

Sprite Artist - Kapi

Writer - Dr Loggey

Linework Assistant - Lewis Macaulay

Music - https://www.silvermansound.com/
